snippet: While the new version is still incompatible with Final Cut Pro 7, exporting soundtracks is now easier and multiple people can work on a project over a network.
lead_paragraph: While the new version is still incompatible with Final Cut Pro 7, exporting soundtracks is now easier and multiple people can work on a project over a network.

headline.main: Final Cut Pro X Gains Features Last Found in a Predecessor
headline.print_headline: Final Cut Pro X Gains Features Last Found In a Predecessor
headline.seo: Apple Adds Some Old Features to Final Cut Pro X
